body.scriptCode: var trigger_txt = Twitter.newTweetFromSearch.Text; var txt = trigger_txt || ''; var price = parseInt((txt.match(/\s\$(\d+)\s/) || [])[1]); if (price >= 400 || isNaN(price)) { skip('EmailDigest.sendDailyEmail'); }

trigger.ingredients: { "Text": "Amazing deal! Flight from SF to NYC for just $299! Limited time offer." }
trigger.name: newTweetFromSearch
